title: [Large-scale] Adaptive Swarm Behavior Project Based on Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (functions, graphs) and simple algorithm design experience
context.additional_context: Small-group project-centered education utilizing smartphone-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Explain at least three optimized pathfinding methods for collective behavior using reinforcement learning principles
Implement a virtual swarm simulation model by applying the TD-error learning algorithm
Quantitatively analyze swarm behavior experiment results to demonstrate at least 20% improvement in optimal pathfinding performance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
